Key: Hmm...
...Hmmmm.
What... was I supposed to do today?
I have a feeling I had plans.
Hmm...
Onii-chan, are you here?
Oh, Kotori? What's the matter?

"Don't "what's the matter" me! Aren't you going to
Kurumi-chan's house today?"
Huh? Why would I go to Kurumi's house?

Because Kurumi's family's going on a trip, and
she's house-sitting, remember? Remember
you were asked to check in on her yesterday?
What...?! Oh... Come to think of it, yeah...

I'm going to go sleep over at my friend's house,
so why don't you spend the night at Kurumi-chan's?
U-Uh, that's not okay!
Who cares? You're childhood friends!

Childhood friends...? R-right... Kurumi and I are
childhood friends. But it's not okay to spend the
night. We're no longer kids.
Hahah. Later, Onii-chan!

...I see... So I was about to go visit my
childhood friend, Kurumi.

Kurumi... I wonder if she's doing okay. I guess
I'll go check in on her.
(So... I'm here at Kurumi's place, but...)
What... is this situation...?
Huh? Oh, Shido-san. Welcome.

"Don't "welcome" me! You didn't answer the door no
matter how much I rang the bell!"

Because I was too lazy to get the door. Oh, go
ahead and sit wherever you want.

Damn it. There's so much I need to tell you, but I
can't even keep up... Anyways, there's no place
for me to sit.

That's not true. You can sit in the spot
next to me.

There's not enough space there... I mean, that's
only wide enough for one person... This room is
a real sty, you know that?

It's usually a bit better. But since my parents
are on a trip...
...Is it a world trip or something?
No, just four days, three nights at Atami.

Basically... in just a few days, you've created
this nightmare nest...

Anyways, Shido-san. Perfect timing. Can you
help me take off Efreet's Horn? It's too
inefficient for me to do alone...

I'm not here to play games! Your mom asked me to
check in on you! Jeez... Stop playing around and
let's clean up.
Whaaaaat.... I'm so lazy...

Don't be lazy. At least clean the stuff you ate!
Jeez, your whole room smells like pan-fried
noodles. Hard to believe this is a girl's room...
Gosh, you're such a nag, friend-o.

Of course I would be. Having a friend
as lazy as you.

Fine, fine, just let me get to a save point first,
then I can help you.

This is YOUR room! Jeez... and what's up with the
way you look?
What about it?
Um, change. You look like a homeless person.

Who cares? I'm in my room. No one's going to visit
anyways.
H-How about me?

Awww, man... Shido-san, you distracted
me and I died.
Pause the game, then...

(She's a lost cause... Jeez. I guess I'll just
clean on my own, then.)
...I'm just going to start cleaning.
Go on ahead...
Jeez...

(I'll start off by throwing away everything
I can...)

...This place is filled with bags from the
convenience store. Have you been eating
food from there this whole time?
Yeah, so? Oh, last night I had hamburgers.

...I'll cook tonight, then. It's not good for your
health to eat cup noodles and snacks every day.
There's nothing in the fridge, though.
I'll go buy something.

Then can you also buy me some juice, ice cream,
and some more snacks?
Okay, okay.

Oh, and some manga, games, and some kind of anime.
Dealer's choice.

Where the hell do you think I'm going shopping?!
I'm going to the market down the street!

...Gosh, fine. I guess I can just order them
online.

...What is up with this room? It's just one trash
heap after another...
Awww, I lost againnn.
Hey, Kurumi. Can I throw this paper bag away?
Just throw away whatever.
And why is your face wash on the floor here?
Oh, there's still some left.

Are you washing your face in here? I bet you
anything you're holding onto things you're not
using anymore. Your room will always be messy.

It's fine! I'm going to use it later,
so just leave it.

Jeez, when exactly is later for you... Damn it,
there's so much stuff coming out from under
your bed...

(There are so many used cosmetics. You're not a
dog or a crow, so don't hide things under your
bed...)

(There's also a dusty pencil case. She's... going
to school, right...?)

(*Grunt*... I just grabbed something soft... It's
her underwear! God, I hope she washed it...)
(There's more stuff in the back...)
Hm? What's this...?

(There's a box with books inside, as if she was
hiding them.)

(Books... under the bed... No. No way.
She is a girl.)
(What do I do? Should I just put it back?)
Take a sneak peek.
Ask Kurumi what's inside.
(I'm so curious. I'm going to check it out.)
(Kurumi is...)
ARGH! God, the weaklings are so annoying. Ugh.

(She's so focused on the game, she's not paying
attention to me. Now's my chance.)
(Hm...? This is...?)
(...An album.)
(There are old photos. Even photos with me.)
(Kurumi... She was adorable back then.)
(Well, even now she's not bad visually, but...)
Hmm... I wonder why she ended up like this.

...Shido-san. What are you mumbling about? It's
creepy that you're doing that in a young maiden's
room.

What maiden are you referring to?!
Wear some clothes!

(No. I guess we're not at that point in our
relationship where she gets shy over stuff.
I'm going to ask her what's inside.)

Hey, Kurumi? What's inside this box I found under
the bed?
What? Under the bed... *gasp*!
Sh-Shido-san... you can't look at that.

What... don't tell me... you're hiding
inappropriate books in here...
N...No. I-It's my album.
Album? As in photo album?

Y-Yes... They're photos of me and you. Of our
childhood.
Who cares. Why are you all shaken up about it?
You can't! ...Um, it's embarrassing, you know?
Embarrassing...? Why?
J-Just because...!

You're so weird. Oh, well... If it's not trash,
then I'll leave it be.

Ahh. Really, this room isn't getting clean at all!
I'm going to stop here and prepare some food
to eat.
Fenkyu～

Don't talk with your mouth full! And why are you
snacking when I'm telling you I'm about to cook?!

Irmean, who fares...*gulp*. When you're done
cooking it, bring it up here, would ya?
You have no intention of moving...
I'm busy right now.
...Hey, Kurumi.
What is it?
...You're taking baths at least, right?
Gosh. How rude, Shido-san. I am a girl, you know.
Oh, sorry about that.
I took a bath, like... 70 hours ago.

WHAT?! That's almost three days! The general
public considers that not bathing!

Three days isn't a big deal. I mean, it's not like
I sweat much. Do you want to smell me?
HELL NO!
I thought you wanted to!

Who do you think I am? Do I look like a dog that
sniffs out drugs?
Gosh, what a nag! I thought you were my friend.

Is your image of a friend someone who'd smell his
other friend who's in her underwear?

Come on, Shido-san, you're being so nitpicky about
everything.
I'm not. You're too messy.
Whaaaat?

Just shut up and go take a bath while I cook.
Got it?
I'm lazy～
Don't be lazy about bathing...
Shido-san. Bathe with me～
Do I look like your caregiver?

Oh? You don't want to bathe with me? You used to
before...

Um. Considering our age, we shouldn't be bathing
together.
But I don't want to unless you go in with me～
What are you, a child?!
Boooo!
...O-Okay, fine. You want me to go in with you?
M-hm. Now... take me to the bathroom.

*Sigh*... Jeez. What am I going to do with you,
Kurumi...
(...And so I took care of Kurumi all day...)
(She is so much work...)

(And what happened in the bath... Yeah, I'm going
to keep that to myself.)
